entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
